reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater comfortable, with one noting it doesn't feel itchy at all, and appreciate its appearance, with one highlighting the pearl buttons as an attractive detail.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and cute sleeves
items.body: Absolutely love this sweater. The pearls are good quality and the sleeves come to a bell/oversized fit. I purposely ordered a bigger size as well for a comfier fit. Read more
items.author: Brooklyn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really beautiful!
items.body: I got the pink and it is so pretty. Very soft, fits well, and the pearls are so dainty and feminine. Dress it up with a skirt or down with jeans. I might order another color. Read more
items.author: K

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute sweater!
items.body: The sweater was as expected with one caveat. Itâ€™s a bit broader across the shoulders than hoped, but not enough to return. Not as flattering as it could be. Iâ€™ve worn it several timesâ€¦no compliments. ðŸ˜ Read more
items.author: Michael Kopesec

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really comfortable!
items.body: Love the sweater! Its beautiful and comfortable. I did have to exchange it cause of an issue with the front coloring of the sweater but it was a no fuss exchange. I got a lot of compliments on it also! Read more
items.author: Kathleen Wood

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Shorter than pictured
items.body: This sweater is very short. The length shown in the picture is not what was delivered. Read more
items.author: Carrie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this sweater. Soft and comfy
items.body: Soft material and comfy. Will e wearing to a holiday party. Ordered XL. Iâ€™m 5â€™10 & 220lbs wear DDD and itâ€™s the perfect length for a taller person and larger chest that has a hard time finding shirts that are long enough. Itâ€™s not skin tight either. Sleeves are extra roomy and comfy. The pearls dress it up. I have not washed it yet fingers crossed it holds up. Iâ€™d recommend washing inside out to protect the pearls and donâ€™t put it in the dryer. Not super heavy material it for or too thin for me. Accurate color for what is pictured ( Burnt orange/rust). Read more
items.author: jonathan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun holiday sweater.
items.body: Very warm sweater. Pearls on the sleeves are great. Quality sweater. Made it through multiple washes (inside out). Color is true to picture. A little oversized but cozy. Read more
items.author: Nicole DeKeyser

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not an item for exchanging
items.body: Sweater is really cute but returns for this item are a pain in the butt. Be ready to wait 30 days at least for your refund or just know what size you for sure need when you order. Read more
items.author: Emily

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, Pink, Beige, Blue, Royal Blue, Black, Rust Red, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
